meanings.definition: The quality or state of not being profitable.
meanings.sent1: The unprofitableness of the business led to its closure.
meanings.sent2: The unprofitableness of the investment was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The unprofitableness of the lemonade stand made the kids switch to selling cookies instead.
meanings.sent4: The unprofitableness of the venture was like trying to grow flowers in a desert.
meanings.sent5: The unprofitableness of the project was as clear as a cloudless sky.

meanings.definition: The lack of financial gain or benefit.
meanings.sent1: She realized the unprofitableness of her savings account.
meanings.sent2: The unprofitableness of the charity event was a concern for the organizers.
meanings.sent3: The unprofitableness of the garage sale made them rethink their pricing strategy.
meanings.sent4: The unprofitableness of the stock market was like a leaky bucket for investors.
meanings.sent5: The unprofitableness of the decision lingered like a shadow over their finances.
